errors.error_description: An unnecessary and incorrect dependency 'check-rst' is listed as a required installation step.
correction_candidates: Remove the line '$ pip install check-rst'.
Change '$ pip install check-rst' to '$ pip install rst-lint'.
Combine the installations into '$ pip install check-rst rstcheck'.
Replace '$ pip install check-rst' with '$ apt-get install rst-checker'.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the line '$ pip install check-rst'.
